org.netbeans.spi.project.ui

Interface LogicalViewProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PathFinder

    public interface LogicalViewProvider
extends PathFinder
    Ability for a Project to supply a logical view of itself.
    See Also:
    Project.getLookup(), ProjectIconAnnotator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node createLogicalView()
      Create a logical view node.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.PathFinder

        findPath

    • Method Detail

      • createLogicalView

        Node createLogicalView()
        Create a logical view node. Projects should not attempt to cache this node in any way; this call should always create a fresh node with no parent. The node's lookup should contain the project object.

        The node need not bother implementing badging for the root node; any files contained in the project will be considered as badging sources automatically. Other subnodes representing various collections of files may still need explicit badging logic. As of org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi/1 1.31

        Returns:
        a node displaying the contents of the project in an intuitive way
        See Also:
        CommonProjectActions.forType(java.lang.String)
